channel.title: Log / exp math stuff
channel.description: Hi, I have a math problem here and can't find the right solution / objects to use here. This screenshot explains it better what I want. I know it has to do something with exponent and log but I can't really fiture it out. Edit: Ok I got something that works until 1024 (2 and than 10 written above) So for my purpose that works, that's the beauty of axoloti I guess, being able to find out stuff by trying out ;) But If someone here understands what I want and has better solution / can explain it I would still be thankful :)

item.title: Log / exp math stuff
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Hi,
I have a math problem here and can't find the right solution / objects to use here. This screenshot explains it better what I want. I know it has to do something with exponent and log but I can't really fiture it out.

Bildschirmfoto 2017-01-24 um 15.46.28.png1180x268 21.7 KB

Edit:
Ok I got something that works until 1024 (2 and than 10 written above)

Bildschirmfoto 2017-01-24 um 15.51.35.png1536x308 29.4 KB

So for my purpose that works, that's the beauty of axoloti I guess, being able to find out stuff by trying out

But If someone here understands what I want and has better solution / can explain it I would still be thankful
